attributes.action: Stop the project to paint the PM’s plane costing the UK taxpayer £900,000
attributes.additional_details: The project is a complete waste of public money especially whilst funds could be better allocated to avoid members of the armed forces from spending their own money on kit, make sure key workers are not short of PPE and thousands of people could be helped financially during the Covid-19 pandemic.
attributes.background: Please keep the RAF Voyager, coloured grey. Do not paint the prime ministerial plane red, white and blue which is estimated to cost the UK taxpayer £900,000 (£600,000 more than the usual refurb cost)

rejection.details:
By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.

You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318316
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315198
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327376
